title: S3 Ep39: A new explanation for wage stagnation
itunes:title: A new explanation for wage stagnation
description: Low-skilled workers are concentrated in sectors with fast productivity growth, so why isn't their pay rising? Rachel Ngai tell Tim Phillips that one explanation is in how low-skilled workers are reallocated between different sectors.Â
